title: Tender for Supply of 1,200,000 Doses of Absorbed Diptheria Tetanus, Pertussis, Hepatitis B and Haemophilus Influenza Type "B" Conjugate Liquid Vaccine BP, USP or EP, IP or WHO IP
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender for a sum of US $2,340,000.00 as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
